message: Let's split fairly considering the inflation impact
Your offer was a good starting point, but the inflation affects me more. Let's meet in the middle.
Considering the inflation, my previous offer was generous. Meeting in the middle doesn't account for the difference in inflation impact.
I understand your point about the inflation difference. How about we meet a bit closer to the middle this time?
The gap in inflation impact is growing, my share should reflect that. This might be the last chance before it's not worth it for me.
We're running out of time, and this isn't worth much if we wait until the last round.  I need to see some real movement to make a deal.
